actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means, H. Rept. 94-1710.

official_title: A bill to amend the Second Liberty Bond Act to allow the interest rates paid on U.S. retirement plan and individual retirement bonds to be increased to the rate paid on U.S. series E savings bonds.

summary.text: Amends the Second Liberty Bond Act to allow the Secretary of the Treasury, with the approval of the President, to increase the rate paid on United States retirement plan bonds and individual retirement bonds so that the investment yield is consistent with that of series E savings bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Second Liberty Bond Act to allow the interest rates paid on U.S. retirement plan and individual retirement bonds to be increased to the rate paid on U.S. series E savings bonds.
